Liono: The Real reason Plissanta is leaving is the fact is she attacked while 
you where in the ark and Thought if she could finish me off and with me gone 
she could go in and say that the preds defeated me and I left her in charge 
but key just happened to be in the area and charged in. ::Picks Key up:: 
Plissanta  made her choice for her own reason and we have to respect her 
decisions. Also I don't expect Iron to fight her but the next time we cross 
her path it will not be as allies ::eyes turn red:: What is give must now 
return for it is not in your heart nor will it obey ::the star disappears For 
good this time::  Good-bye ::Flies away with key in his arms:: We have a date 
to finish a lass. As promised
